title: Can anyone help me translate this?
body: So I have no idea what this mean, this guy added me after a game, said that stuff, invited and kicked me from and, then deleted me. Thanks in advance. [](http://)

replies.body: gj on completely removing the guys name OP
He called you an idiot dog son, F*ck your whole family, and why don't you go die. 傻逼 means idiot, 狗 means dog 死 means die. You should ignore him, he is just being salty.

http://i64.tinypic.com/28qzpuf.jpg

You're gonna need to remove all that excess stuff around the link. Just paste teh image link and nothing else. And sorry, I can't translate that. Your best bet would be to copy the text directly and put it into google translate.
